author: hayfasfar
body:
#### PR description:

This PR introduces the Tracker CRACK geometry and enables the production of cosmic rays up to the simulation step, as described in the [associated README](https://github.com/hayfasfar/cmssw/tree/from-CMSSW_15_0_1/Geometry/TrackerCommonData/data/CRack_PhaseII#readme).

This addition is fully transparent to the main Phase-2 CMS workflows and does not interfere with standard geometry configurations. It can be merged safely without impacting existing setups.

#### PR Validation:

    The geometry generation and GEN-SIM workflow have been tested successfully.

    Results confirm that both the detector structure and simulation chain perform as expected.

This is the first PR related to the CRACK project, laying the foundation for further developments and integration work.
title: From cmssw 15 0 1
